response.original_title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (Extended Edition)
response.overview: The prequel trilogy to Peter Jackson's The Lord Of The Rings. Bilbo encounters some mystery guests at his home invited by his good friend, The Wizard, Gandalf The Grey. Soon, he is on an adventure to help restore the Dwarven Kingdom, but for someone who has never left his hometown, Bilbo is in for an epic quest ahead as he and his friends encounter all sorts of terrifying creatures in the mystical lands of Middle Earth.
response.tagline: A very unexpected journey out of Bag And to the wild wonders of Middle Earth.
response.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (Extended Edition)
